name: Escape
description:
This game is a sports zombie fighting game independently developed by myself. It uses props from different scenes to fight against zombies, complete various level tasks, and start the next level. Each level has different gameplay. Currently, the first chapter has three levels, which are under development

Level Description:

In the first level, fight against a fierce zombie on the field. You can pick up the ball and shoot, and when the zombie approaches, you can kick it to widen the distance to avoid infection. Defeat the zombie leader to win;

The second level is to block zombie attacks on the rooftop, where you can pick up bricks to repel zombies and persist until the end of time to win;

In the third level, enter the building to clean up zombies. You can pick up weapons to fight against zombies and rescue unconscious individuals. Arrive at the exit to win

Gaming methods

Press "W.S.A.D" to move, use the left and right mouse strokes, press "SHIFT" to accelerate, press "Space" to sprint and dodge, press "ESC" to pause the game
